mcq.q: Which browser is NOT explicitly recommended for the Infosys assessment?

fillBlanks.q: The minimum upload speed required for the internet connection is ______ Mbps.
Besides a government photo ID, you are required to bring your ______ ID to the test venue.

trueFalse.q: Using online communication applications during the test is permitted.
You can use a calculator during the Infosys assessment.

mcq.q: What is the maximum time allowed to login after the test slot begins?
What happens if you miss the login window?
options: You can contact support to reschedule.
You will not be able to take the test.
The test will automatically start after 15 minutes.
mcq.answer: You will not be able to take the test.

mcq.q: Who can you contact if you have questions during the assessment?

fillBlanks.q: The entire duration of the test is ________ in person.

trueFalse.q: Exemptions will be made if you miss the login window.
Candidates risk application cancellation for any malpractice or violation of instructions.
